​​
Order Grubhub pick up only ORDER WITH UBER FOR PICK UP OR DELIVERY ​ Create Your Poke   choose a base Poke bowl  ( sushi rice or brown rice)Poke Salad  (see store for options)Burrito  (sushi or brown rice W. seaweed paper)     Protein: Pick 1 $13.50 or Pick 2 $16   *Ahi tuna                     Chicken                        *Salmon                  Shrimp * Spicy Ahi          Tofu         Grilled Eel(seasonal)Mix In Ingredients: Pick 3  -cucumber        -edamme          -ogo seaweed   -cilantro           -shiso leaf(mint leaf)      -mango -asparagus         -tamago     -sweet onion     -scallion            -jalapeno     -pineapple-black bean       -carrot         -romaine lettuce      - chickpeaSauces: (choose 1) -classic poke         -oba dressing          -ponzu dressing     -sweet chili          -wasabi mayo            -sriracha mayo(spicy Mayo) -soy ginger        -wasabi yuzu       -mango sauce     -eel sauce-spicy classic     -creamy sauce topping : Pick 2    -avocado   -seaweed salad        *spicy tuna     -crab salad    *masago -corn         *spicy salmon -squid salad      -pickled cucumber  Free Garnish: -sesame seeds    fried onion
